name: Airavat
storyline: In 2000 BCE, space organization of Indus Valley Civilization predicted that the earth is going to experience multiple asteroid hits in a few thousand years. The ancient space organization developed Airavat, a spaceship, launched it into the deep space to explore the universe and find a new home out there, somewhere.
summary:
Airavat is an endless space survival game. The rules are simple, but the game is hard to master. In Airavat, you will control a very ancient spaceship built by the people of Indus Valley Civilization. The gravity of stars is the biggest enemy and you need to protect the spaceship and keep away from the stars. Build a high score by avoiding as many stars as you can. 
 
Airavat is a minimalist game with: 
 
- Insane touch controls 
- Great music 
- Awesome nebular backgrounds 
 
History 
In 2000 BCE, space organization of Indus Valley Civilization predicted that the earth is going to experience multiple asteroid hits in a few thousand years. The ancient space organization developed Airavat, a spaceship, launched it into the deep space to explore the universe and find a new home out there, somewhere.
